wikipedia_page.main: Sir Bryce Chudleigh Burt, CIE, MBE (29 April 1881 – 2 January 1943) was an administrator in India during the British Raj period and a Fellow of the Royal Society of Arts. He was awarded a knighthood on 1 January 1936, having previously been made a Companion of the Order of the Indian Empire in 1930 and a Member of the Order of the British Empire in 1919.

response: *Sir Bryce Chudleigh Burt (1881–1943) – administrator in the British Raj born in Newark

response: *Bryce Chudleigh Burt  Indian Agricultural Service, Agricultural Expert to the Imperial Council of Agricultural Research.
